chapters.title: Chapter 36:  Daughter of the Night
chapters.info: Ilyena Therin Moerelle, p. 412 (329)—Wife of Lews Therin Telamon. Lanfear refers to her as a “straw-haired chit.” This is because Lanfear loved Lews Therin, and he returned her love before he met Ilyena. See also Telamon, Lews Therin.
